source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_masterdata_map_dim (
    IMSMasterdataMapID,
    MasterdataMapIDLegacy,
    MasterdataMapCoded,
    IMSMasterdataMapName,
    IMSMasterdataMapNumber,
    BCDAttributeNumber,
    BCDEntity,
    BCDEntityNumber,
    MasterdataTextContainer,
    IsItIMSMasterdata,
    MasterdataHelp,
    MasterdataVolumeOfRecords,
    IMSInformationAssetsIMSMasterdataMap,
    IMSInformationAssetsIMSMasterdataMapName,
    IMSInformationAssetsID,
    IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMap,
    IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMapName,
    IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMapNameID,
    MasterdataMapUserID,
    MasterdataMapInformationOwner,
    MasterdataMapUser1ID,
    MasterdataMapInformationExpert,
    MasterdataMapType,
    MasterdataMapStatus,
    MasterdataMapPriority,
    MasterdataMapResolution,
    MasterdataMapWorkLog,
    IMSBDCAID,
    IMSIAID,
    IMSMasterdataMapDateModified,
    MasterdataMapSecurityGroups,
    MasterdataMapAssignedUserLink,
    MasterdataMapDescription,
    MasterdataMapModifiedUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.ims_master_data_map_number NULLS LAST)      AS IMSMasterdataMapID,
    T1.mdm_id AS MasterdataMapIDLegacy,
    T1.id AS MasterdataMapCoded,
    T1.name AS IMSMasterdataMapName,
    T1.ims_master_data_map_number AS IMSMasterdataMapNumber,
    T1.bdc_attribute_number_c AS BCDAttributeNumber,
    T1.bdc_entity_c AS BCDEntity,
    T1.bdc_entity_number_c AS BCDEntityNumber,
    T1.mdm_text_container_c AS MasterdataTextContainer,
    T1.master_data_c AS IsItIMSMasterdata,
    T1.help AS MasterdataHelp,
    T1.volume_of_records AS MasterdataVolumeOfRecords,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1 AS IMSInformationAssetsIMSMasterdataMap,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1_name AS IMSInformationAssetsIMSMasterdataMapName,
    T1.ims_informed1b_assets_ida AS IMSInformationAssetsID,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1 AS IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMap,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1_name AS IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMapName,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1ims_bdc_attribute_ida AS IMSAttributeIMSMasterdataMapNameID,
    T1.user_id_c AS MasterdataMapUserID,
    T1.information_owner_c AS MasterdataMapInformationOwner,
    T1.user_id1_c AS MasterdataMapUser1ID,
    T1.information_expert_c AS MasterdataMapInformationExpert,
    T1.type AS MasterdataMapType,
    T1.status AS MasterdataMapStatus,
    T1.priority AS MasterdataMapPriority,
    T1.resolution AS MasterdataMapResolution,
    T1.work_log AS MasterdataMapWorkLog,
    T1.fk_bdca_id AS IMSBDCAID,
    T1.fk_ia_id AS IMSIAID,
    T1.date_modified AS IMSMasterdataMapDateModified,
    'No Info' AS MasterdataMapSecurityGroups,
    'No Info' AS MasterdataMapAssignedUserLink,
    'No Info' AS MasterdataMapDescription,
    'No Info' AS MasterdataMapModifiedUserLink,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.mdm_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_master_data_map_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_number_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_number_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.mdm_text_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.master_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.volume_of_records,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_informed1b_assets_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1ims_bdc_attribute_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.fk_bdca_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.fk_ia_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.'))                                                                   AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_masterdatamap T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_master_data_map_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.mdm_id,
    T1.id,
    T1.name,
    T1.ims_master_data_map_number,
    T1.bdc_attribute_number_c,
    T1.bdc_entity_c,
    T1.bdc_entity_number_c,
    T1.mdm_text_container_c,
    T1.master_data_c,
    T1.help,
    T1.volume_of_records,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1_name,
    T1.ims_informed1b_assets_ida,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1_name,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1ims_bdc_attribute_ida,
    T1.user_id_c,
    T1.information_owner_c,
    T1.user_id1_c,
    T1.information_expert_c,
    T1.type,
    T1.status,
    T1.priority,
    T1.resolution,
    T1.work_log,
    T1.fk_bdca_id,
    T1.fk_ia_id,
    T1.date_modified
